extensionDescription.message: Send selected text to AI via the right-click menu.

customLanguageLabel.message: Or enter a custom language in the language-country format:

contextMenuTextChatGPT.message: Send selected text to ChatGPT and get a response in {language}

contextMenuLinkChatGPT.message: Send link to ChatGPT and get a response in {language}

contextMenuTextGemini.message: Send selected text to Gemini and get a response in {language}

contextMenuLinkGemini.message: Send link to Gemini and get a response in {language}

contextMenuTextClaude.message: Send selected text to Claude and get a response in {language}

contextMenuLinkClaude.message: Send link to Claude and get a response in {language}

contextMenuTextPOE.message: Send selected text to POE and get a response in {language}

contextMenuLinkPOE.message: Send link to POE and get a response in {language}

contextMenuRewriteWithChatGPT.message: Rewrite the text in {language} using ChatGPT

contextMenuRewriteWithGemini.message: Rewrite the text in {language} using Gemini

contextMenuRewriteWithClaude.message: Rewrite the text in {language} using Claude

contextMenuRewriteWithPOE.message: Rewrite the text in {language} using POE

contextMenuTextTranslationChatGPT.message: Translate selected text to {language} with ChatGPT

contextMenuLinkTranslationChatGemini.message: Translate selected text to {language} with Gemini
